#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define total 5000005
#define Me 1000000000001
#define NIL 0
#define MAXN 100005
#define EPS 1e-5
#define INF (1<<28)
#define pi 3.141593
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;

int main(){
	int t,sec;
	string A;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>A;
		int h=(A[0]-'0')*10 + (A[1]-'0');
		int m=(A[2]-'0')*10 + (A[3]-'0');
		int s;
		cin>>s;
		int m1=m+(s/60),m2=m+(s/60);
		if(s%60)
			m1++;
		int h1=h,h2=h;
		if(m1>=60)
		{
			h1+=(m1/60);
			h1%=24;
			m1%=60;
		}
		if(m2>=60)
		{
			h2+=(m2/60);
			h2%=24;
			m2%=60;
		}
		pair <int,int> t1(h1,m1), t2(h2,m2);
		pair <int,int> ft=max(t1,t2);
		if(ft.first>=10)
			cout<<ft.first;
		else
			cout<<"0"<<ft.first;
		if(ft.second>=10)
			cout<<ft.second<<"\n";
		else
			cout<<"0"<<ft.second<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
